page.title: 20MULLION SCHOOL SUMMER FAYRE
page.content: On 21st July 1985,Mullion School held a 'Summer Fayre'.This event is organised every other year by the parent/teacher association to raise money for equipment for the school which is not supplied by the Local Education Authority. There was a display by a parachute team, a concert by the Cornwall Youth Jazz Orchestra, displays by local gymnastics, dancing and art groups. Each tutor group in Years 1 to 4(16 in all) organised a stall.There was a coconut shy,a ducking stool,stalls for produce, including sea food,cakes,sweets; a 'beatthe goalie' competition, raffles and many more. Over Â£2000 was raised to be spent on maintaining the school bus and providing a video camera for the school.Most teachers believe this should be financed by the Education Authority,but funds are limited.
